1.title: Wedding Day

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: When Steve Esworthy is found beaten to death in a quiet neighborhood in Harrisburg, PA, it's up to Dauphin County Coroner Graham Hetrick to read Steve's wounds and uncover the killer behind one of the most unusual deaths he's ever seen.

2.title: Hand in Glove

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Popular jockey Juan Vives is found stabbed to death in the woods just days before Christmas. Coroner Graham Hetrick and investigators must explore the racing circuit to determine if the killer was a jealous rival or a dark horse.

3.title: The Wax Bags

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot:
Know what this is about?

4.title: One Tiny Bone

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: The body of 83 year old Peggy Swann is found decomposing in her basement and it is a shock to everyone who knew her. Coroner Graham Hetrick will have to listen to the story Peggy's body tells in order to help investigators.

5.title: Wound Patterns

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: The night after Thanksgiving, popular activist Rayon Braxton is found shot to death in his Harrisburg, PA community center. Coroner Graham Hetrick must read Rayon's wounds to reveal a cold blooded killer and shocking betrayal.

6.title: Where He Stood

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Barbara Gooding's life is torn apart when her son, 18 year old Keoin Gooding, dies in her arms. It's up to Coroner Graham Hetrick to read Keoin's bullet wounds to determine who shot the teenager, leaving the entire community stunned.

7.title: Hitender Thankur

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot:

8.title: He'll Open the Door

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot:

1.title: Rigor Mortis

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: When a young mother is beaten and shot to death in her tough Harrisburg neighborhood, investigators aren't lacking for suspects. But Coroner Graham Hetrick sees signs of a crime of passion and believes Iris' killer could be hiding in plain sight.

2.title: Call the Coroner

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: When a woman is killed in her backyard, investigators focus on her family. But Graham believes this is a special kind of assassin who kills for the thrill of it. The clock is ticking; will the murderer be caught before he strikes again?

3.title: Trial by Fire

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: When a young, married couple is discovered in the aftermath of a house fire, firefighters fear they arrived too late. Coroner Graham Hetrick knows this fire is no accident... it's a double murder. Graham may find the truth, but will justice be served?

4.title: Unburying the Truth

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Dauphin County Coroner Graham Hetrick is facing the biggest challenge of career: prove multiple murders when there are no bodies, and nobody knows the identity of the victims. If successful, he could stop a serial killer in his tracks.

5.title: Skin Deep

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: When the smoke clears from a mysterious car fire, a charred body is discovered in the backseat. Only Coroner Graham Hetrick can identify the victim and the story of the man's life, and the secrets of his death, reveal atrocities no one ever imagined.

6.title: Clash of Wills

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: A motel worker is murdered. signs point to a crime of passion.

7.title: Washing of the Sins

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Investigating the stabbing death of a man whose body was wrapped in garbage bags.

10.title: Traumatic Ending

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: Dauphin County Coroner Graham Hetrick is facing the biggest challenge of career: prove multiple murders when there are no bodies, and nobody knows the identity of the victims. If successful, he could stop a serial killer in his tracks.

1.title: First Cut Is the Deepest

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Career Army soldier Sam Gore is found viciously stabbed inside his home in Harrisburg, Pa. Dauphin County Coroner Graham Hetrick must look to Sam's wounds to determine if Sam was simply a soldier of misfortune or if the murder was premeditated.

2.title: Touch Me and Die

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: In Hershey, Pa., Bob Curley dies shortly after being rushed to the E.R. with bizarre symptoms; and Hetrick hunts for evidence to prove if his exposure to a deadly poison was accidental-or murder.

3.title: Internal Trauma

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: The murder of 86-year-old Goldie Snyder in her Harrisburg, Pa. bait shop is investigated. Hetrick suspects the killer has done this before and, unless captured, will kill again.

4.title: Clues from the Body

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Forensic entomology is used to solve a case involving a decomposed body in Harrisburg, PA.

5.title: Love in Pieces

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: When the body of Dale Bloom is discovered mutilated in his home in Harrisburg, PA, it's up to Dauphin County Coroner Graham Hetrick to read the numerous wounds and determine not only why Dale was targeted, but uncover the identity of a disturbed killer.

6.title: Six Letters, Starts with M

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: The tight-knit community of Hummelstown, Pa., is torn apart after 82-year-old Kathryn Bishop is found beaten to death; since every suspect has an alibi, Coroner Graham Hetrick must rely on evidence from an unlikely source.

7.title: Under the Skin

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Kim Granison is found fighting for her life in the middle of the street - the apparent victim of a hit and run. When she succumbs to her injuries, Dauphin County Coroner Graham Hetrick suspects this might be more than an accident... it might be a murder.

8.title: Make It Hurt

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: When well-known bookie John Troutman is found brutally murdered in his apartment, Dauphin County Coroner Graham Hetrick is immediately called to the scene. Graham must read John's many wounds to uncover a hatred that lies dangerously close to home.

9.title: Spiderwebs

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: In Harrisburg, Pa., disc jockey Tony Haines is found dead with multiple gunshot wounds to his head; Coroner Graham Hetrick must determine if Haines was in the wrong place at the wrong time or targeted for keeping a deadly secret.

10.title: Contact Wound

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: In Hummelstown, Pa., Dale Orwan is found savagely murdered in his home; Coroner Graham Hetrick is immediately called to the scene, where he discovers a house of horrors; the only suspect is a women who left her clothes behind.

-1.title: Horror at the Hotel

episode of.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead (TV Series 2016– )

imdb.plot outline: For the last 25 years, Graham Hetrick has been the Coroner of Dauphin County, Pennsylvania. He handles close to 700 suspicious deaths each year. The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead chronicles some of his most mysterious and disturbing homicides. While detectives search for clues among the living, Graham - a medical death investigator - is uncovering the secrets of the dead.
imdb.title: The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead
plot: For the last 25 years, Graham Hetrick has been the Coroner of Dauphin County, Pennsylvania. He handles close to 700 suspicious deaths each year. _The Coroner: I Speak for the Dead_ (qv) chronicles some of his most mysterious and disturbing homicides. While detectives search for clues among the living, Graham - a medical death investigator - is uncovering the secrets of the dead.
